reviewText: Video is great in teaching you the potential behind using the many and varied presser feet on the market today. The video groups the presser feet by their use whether for decorative stitching or finishing. Clear, concise use of the presser foot is presented in a very well done fashion. The up close taping of the presser foot in action is excellent. The video allows you to explore much more presser feet than other videos I have bought, even Fancy Feet2 by Nancy Zieman. This DVD is a must have for any seamstress, or sewer who believes they want to master these not so mystifying presser feet once I observed this video
